Package rover

Class RoverMode

java.lang.Object
rover.RoverMode
public class RoverMode
extends java.lang.Object
Interface to use any rover mode indifferently. During its life, the rover will be in a few different modes. However they all share the following properties, summed up inside the RoverMode interface
Author:
Antoine Stevan

  • Field Details

    • LANDING

      static int LANDING
      Code for the landing mode. When the rover has just landed on Mars, this is the appropriate code to be used in Blinker.blink(int, int) or Blinker.blink(int, int, int). This will trigger the right sounds and light effects.
      See Also:
      Blinker.blink(int, int), Blinker.blink(int, int, int)

    • DIAGNOSTIC

      static int DIAGNOSTIC
      Code for the diagnostic mode. When the rover is under internal inspection, this is the appropriate code to be used in Blinker.blink(int, int) or Blinker.blink(int, int, int). This will trigger the right sounds and light effects.
      See Also:
      Blinker.blink(int, int), Blinker.blink(int, int, int)

    • ERROR

      static int ERROR
      Code for the error mode. When the internal inspection of the rover reports any error, this is the appropriate code to be used in Blinker.blink(int, int) or Blinker.blink(int, int, int). This will trigger the right sounds and light effects.
      See Also:
      Blinker.blink(int, int), Blinker.blink(int, int, int)

    • EXPLORATION

      static int EXPLORATION
      Code for the exploration mode. When the rover has to explore its environment to locate samples, this is the appropriate code to be used in Blinker.blink(int, int) or Blinker.blink(int, int, int). This will trigger the right sounds and light effects.
      See Also:
      Blinker.blink(int, int), Blinker.blink(int, int, int)

    • HARVEST

      static int HARVEST
      Code for the harvest mode. When the rover has located a sample and needs to harvest it, this is the appropriate code to be used in Blinker.blink(int, int) or Blinker.blink(int, int, int). This will trigger the right sounds and light effects.
      See Also:
      Blinker.blink(int, int), Blinker.blink(int, int, int)

    • WAIT

      static int WAIT
      Code for the wait mode. When the rover has to wait until a button is pressed, this is the appropriate code to be used in Blinker.blink(int, int) or Blinker.blink(int, int, int). This will trigger the right sounds and light effects.
      See Also:
      Blinker.blink(int, int), Blinker.blink(int, int, int)

    • SLEEP

      static int SLEEP
      Code for the sleep mode. When the rover is sleeping after all its work, this is the appropriate code to be used in Blinker.blink(int, int) or Blinker.blink(int, int, int). This will trigger the right sounds and light effects.
      See Also:
      Blinker.blink(int, int), Blinker.blink(int, int, int)

  • Constructor Details

    • RoverMode

      public RoverMode()

  • Method Details

    • enter_diagnostic_mode

      void enter_diagnostic_mode()
      Starts the diagnostic mode. When the rover is under internal inspection, it enters the diagnostic mode and checks every sub system. This is the proper method to use to trigger 'diagnostic' sound and light effects.

    • enter_error_mode

      void enter_error_mode()
      Starts the error mode. When the internal inspection of the rover reports any error, the rover enters the error mode and go to sleep because the mission is compromised. This is the proper method to use to trigger 'error' sound and light effects.

    • enter_landind_mode

      void enter_landind_mode()
      Starts the landing mode. When the rover lands on the surface of Mars, it enters the landing mode and waits for any button press. This is the proper method to use to trigger 'landing' sound and light effects.

    • enter_exploration_mode

      void enter_exploration_mode()
      Starts the exploration mode. When the rover has to explore its environment ro locate samples, it enters the exploration mode and explores its environment. This is the proper method to use to trigger 'exploration' sound and light effects.

    • enter_harvest_mode

      void enter_harvest_mode()
      Starts the harvest mode. When the rover has located a sample and needs to harvest it, it enters the harvest mode and do what it has to do to retrieve the sample. This is the proper method to use to trigger 'harvest' sound and light effects.

    • enter_wait_mode

      void enter_wait_mode()
      Starts the wait mode. When the rover needs to wait for a button to be pressed, it enters the wait mode. This is the proper method to use to trigger 'wait' sound and light effects.

    • enter_sleep_mode

      void enter_sleep_mode()
      Starts the sleep mode. When the rover needs to sleep after completing its tasks, it enters the sleep mode. This is the proper method to use to trigger 'sleep' sound and light effects.

    • stop

      void stop()
      Stops any mode for the rover. Every RoverMode can stop a sequence of sound and light effects.
